plugins.name: github-pr-reviewer
plugins.description: Automated PR code review for GitHub Actions with semantic deduplication and inline comments

plugins.name: local-code-reviewer
plugins.description: Local code review skills for pre-PR review and PR comment resolution. Same criteria as github-pr-reviewer for consistency.

plugins.name: dev-flow
plugins.description: Guided 6-phase feature development workflow with session management, parallel agents, and convention detection
